titleStmt.title: A treatise co[n]cernynge diuers of the constitucyons prouynciall and legantines
titleStmt.author: Saint German, Christopher, 1460?-1540, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Godfray. Cum priuilegio regali,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Christopher Saint German.
Identified as STC 10084 on UMI microfilm reel 8.
Reproductions of the originals in Cambridge University Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 8 (Cambridge University Library copy) and at reel 18 (British Library copy).
